AddNew.description: Add new custom user agent for a certain domain

Default.description: Use the browser's default UA string

Delete.description: Deletes the custom user agent for this domain

Description.message: Adds a menu and a toolbar button to switch the user agent of a browser.

DownloadLatest.description: Allows a user to download the latest version of the user-agents file

EnterHost.description: Host to which to assign a custom user agent

PropertyName.description: Name of the property of navigator

PropertyValue.description: Value of the property of navigator

ResetConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset all the User Agent Switcher options including the user agent list?

UserAgentsFile.description: The URL of the file containing the list of user agents

UserAgentFor.description: The user agent to use on URLs with the host $1

XMLHttpRequestError.message: An error occurred while trying to retrieve the list of user agents: $1
